entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 p.m. ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023
